annotations:
Dear Friends & Colleagues
Good day,
Direct from very close owners friends whom we have done plenty of their chartering business over the years.
MV PROJECT A
5595 DWT General Cargo Ship
Built: 1997, Imamura, Japan
Flag: Togo
Class INSB, SS & DD: 21/9/2024
LOA/Beam/Draft: 92.0/16.0/7.11
Ho/Ha: /2
Grain: 8968
Gear: Derrick 1x35.0, Derrick 2x25.0
Main engine: Akasaka A41
BWTS fitted
(All dtls wog)
Trading PG/ Indian Ocean where inspectable by arrangemenets.
Suitable for loading project Cargoes with big holds capacity.
Fullest details available here up on reuest.
Can guide you closely on price idea.
Best regards
Ahmad Jaohar
Shipbroker
S&P - Chartering
United JMT Shipbrokers
p:+46188432196  m: +46 762575818
a:Stora Gatan 2E,  office No. 1501
722 12 Västerås, Sweden
w:www.unitedjmt.co.uk
